text: The brain named itself.
A teaspoon of neutron star weighs 6 billion tons.
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping.
The first webcam watched a coffee pot.
A shrimp's heart is in its head.
The dot over an 'i' is called a tittle.
Lobsters taste with their feet.
There are more stars than grains of sand on Earth.
A group of pugs is called a grumble.
Bananas are radioactive.
The inventor of the chocolate chip cookie sold the recipe for $1.
Humans and giraffes have the same number of neck bones: 7.
There's a basketball court on top of the Supreme Court building.
The hashtag symbol is called an octothorpe.
A group of ferrets is called a business.
Your body replaces itself every 7-10 years.
Lobsters were once considered prison food.
The moon is moving away from Earth 3.8 cm per year.
Cows kill more people annually than sharks.
A group of ravens is called an unkindness.
Nintendo was founded in 1889 as a playing card company.
Mosquitoes have killed more humans than any other animal.
The human eye can distinguish 10 million colors.
Octopuses have 9 brains — one central and 8 in arms.
A group of unicorns is called a blessing.
The inventor of the treadmill created it as a prison punishment.
Spiders can survive in space.
Elephants can't jump, but they can swim.
The average cloud weighs 1.1 million pounds.
A group of squid is called a squad.
The word 'testify' comes from men swearing on testicles.
Goldfish memory lasts months, not seconds.
Venus rotates backwards compared to other planets.
The tongue is the fastest healing body part.
A group of hippos is called a bloat.
The inventor of the Rubik's Cube took a month to solve it.
An octopus can fit through any hole larger than its beak.
Giraffes only sleep 30 minutes per day.
Saturn's moon Titan has more oil than Earth.
A group of foxes is called a skulk.
The first YouTube video was about elephants at a zoo.
Camels have three eyelids per eye.
The heart of a shrimp is in its head.
A group of rhinos is called a crash.
The word 'alphabet' comes from alpha and beta.
The inventor of the Super Soaker was a NASA engineer.
Rats laugh when tickled.
A bolt of lightning contains 1 billion volts.
A group of ladybugs is called a loveliness.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than all land combined.
Babies don't have kneecaps — they develop later.
A group of tigers is called an ambush.
The inventor of the Segway died on a Segway.
Sperm whales sleep vertically.
A day on Neptune lasts 16 hours.
A group of skunks is called a surfeit.
The inventor of the AK-47 regretted his creation.
Woodpeckers have tongues that wrap around their skulls.
A group of peacocks is called an ostentation.
The inventor of basketball wrote the first rulebook.
A group of zebras is called a dazzle.
The inventor of dynamite created the Nobel Prize.
A group of stingrays is called a fever.
The inventor of the World Wide Web made it royalty-free.
A group of whales is called a pod.
The inventor of the telephone never called his family.
A group of vultures is called a venue.
The inventor of the guillotine opposed the death penalty.
A group of wolves is called a pack.
The inventor of matches made them after lighters.
A group of turtles is called a bale.
The inventor of post-its discovered them by accident.
A group of turkeys is called a rafter.
The inventor of the escalator was afraid to ride it.
A group of toads is called a knot.
The inventor of the shopping cart hired actors to use it.
A group of swans is called a bevy.
The inventor of barbed wire changed the American West.
A group of sparrows is called a host.
The inventor of the sewing machine had his shop burned down.
A group of snakes is called a nest.
The inventor of the cotton gin made slavery more profitable.
A group of seals is called a pod.
The inventor of Velcro was inspired by burrs.
A group of sharks is called a shiver.
The inventor of the bra was a socialite.
A group of salmon is called a run.
The inventor of the skateboard used roller skate wheels.
A group of rabbits is called a colony.
The inventor of the printing press was a goldsmith.
A group of quail is called a covey.
The inventor of the parachute never tested it himself.
A group of penguins is called a colony.
The inventor of the revolver was 18 years old.
A group of pelicans is called a pod.
The inventor of the phonograph was partially deaf.
A group of parrots is called a pandemonium.
The inventor of the saxophone was trying to improve the clarinet.
A group of otters is called a romp.
The inventor of corn flakes was against sugar.
